Summary: Circle lighted object at 2400-2600 feet over the horizon.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWe live in Lakewood Ranch Fl, the object we saw was a circle flashing light object that hovered in the sky for over an hour, we called Madill air force base, no aircraft were deployed, we called the FAA tower at Sarasota and they had not objects on Radar. Called Manatee county sheriffs who arrived and confirmed object but had no idea what it was. After an hour it just disappeared
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around September 15th 2008
